#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,j,i;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	for(j=0;j<t;j++)
	{
		char a[100005];
		string b,c;
		scanf("%s",a);
		int p = a[0]-'0';
		for(i=1;i<strlen(a);i++)
		{
			if(a[i] >= 'A' && a[i] <= 'Z')
			{
				b.push_back(a[i]);
			}
			else
			{
				while(p!=0)
				{
					c.append(b);
					p-=1;
				}
				p = a[i]-'0';
				b.erase(b.begin(),b.end());
			}
		}
		while(p!=0)
		{
			c.append(b);
			p-=1;
		}
		cout<<c<<"\n";
	}
return 0;
}
